author: stevel
msg: change by James M Snell to send SC_NO_CONTENT back when the server had nothing to say

author: rsitze
msg: I'd like to submit a patch that makes the following changes to the JWS processing supported by Axis.  I needed these changes to implement a small project I've been working on:
o    Allows the scope of a JWS hander service object to be specified in the server-config.wsdd file, e.g.
o    Allows multiple kinds of JWS handler to be set on the global chain, associated with a file-extension (so for example allowing .jwr files to be scoped as request scope):
o    Cleans up various constant strings used in the JavaProvider
o    Uses a cache for JWS rpc objects to they don't have to be re-instantiated on each request.

author: rsitze
msg: Also moved related emitter constants to same.

author: rsitze
msg: a) Replace with appropriate log statement.

author: scheu
msg: Improved command line messages for WSDL2Java and Java2WSDL per IBM user's experience.
Fixed minor bug in Java2WSDL help message processing that was causing the options to
be duplicated in the help message.
